entry.title: Pack of 2 | 52"x64” Black Sequin Curtains With Rod Pocket Window Treatment Panels
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_3110
Type: Curtains
Price: 39.99 - 227.99 (2 variants)

[About]

Material: Sequins atop Tulle Net fabric
Color: Black
Size: 52 Inch wide x 64 Inch long
Rod Pocket Size: 4"
Comes with heavy duty vinyl bag
Set includes: Two (2) curtain panels
Care Instruction: Dry Clean Only
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

    [Information]

    Add that POP to any space and room décor with this glitzy piece of seamless sheen. Tons of shiny shimmering sequin rounds are stitched with intricate craftsmanship atop mesh fabric in an utmost delicacy and beauty. These semi sheer curtain panels will beautifully filter bright sunlight and fresh air into your room while still maintaining unparalleled privacy. Gracefully sewn rod pockets will assist in effortless installation and efficient mobility of the curtains. Glam up your room décor or window treatment, use as sparkling photo backgrounds and backdrops, or as fancy French Door and Patio drapes.

    Additional Information:

    • Material: Sequins atop Tulle Net fabric 
    • Color: Black
    • Size: 52 Inch wide x 64 Inch long 
    • Rod Pocket Size: 4"
    • Comes with heavy duty vinyl bag
    • Set includes: Two (2) curtain panels, each measuring 52 Inch wide x 64 Inch long

entry.title: 54" x 4Yards Iridescent Premium Sequin Fabric Bolt
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_5210
Type: Fabrics
Price: 28.49

[About]

Quantity: 1 Sequin Fabric Bolt
Material: Shiny Sequin Beads atop Tulle Net Fabric
Color: Iridescent
Width: 54"
Length: 4Yards
Edges: Not Finished
Sequin Size: 3mm
Great for Draping tables, Ceilings, Walls, and can also be used to fuel your own creativity.
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

 

Premium Sequin Fabric Bolt 

This elegantly shimmering piece with 54" x 4Yards Iridescent Premium Sequin Fabric Bolt comprises of shiny sequin beads crafted atop tulle netting with the utmost perfection. The seamless glitz and glam will add heaps of royal sheen and glamorous appeal to whatever this extravagant masterpiece will embrace. 

Glittering Fabric

This particularly dazzling fabric is a perfect choice for crafting something elegant, graceful, and fit for royalty. The very design of this glittering fabric exudes joie de vivre and radiance. Style your dresses or embellish your decor brightly, boldly, and beautifully with this truly breathtaking masterpiece.

3mm Round Sequins

Shimmering sequins have been laced throughout with iridescent thread to augment its vivacity and sparkle. Like its name, this shimmering piece showcases your prestige, status, and beguiling charisma. Indulge your creativity with this charming material and drape your dreary arches, tables, chairs, and aisle with the lustrous glimmer and alluring elegance of this extravagant material.

 

Additional Information:

  • Quantity: 1 Sequin Fabric Bolt
  • Material: Shiny Sequin Beads atop Tulle Net Fabric
  • Color: Iridescent
  • Width: 54"
  • Length: 4Yards
  • Edges: Not Finished
  • Sequin Size: 3mm
  • Uses: Backdrops, Dress Making, Prom Dresses, Runners, Hanging Decor, Draping Tables and Ceilings, DIY

Big Payette Sequin Rectangle Tablecloth

The New Design and the killer look for your table is in!! Bring home our luxury linens with our Payette Sequin Tablecloths! This glittery Payette tablecloth with is specially designed and crafted to make your guests and bystanders awestruck at your opulence, generosity and grandeur. 

Deluxe Fabric

This exclusive sequin tablecloth is made from the deluxe fabric and exhibit glorious and catchy appeal. This startling tablecloth is perfect to greet the guests at glance with its outstanding shine and elegance. 

Shimmery Big Sequins

It will surely satisfy the visual craving of the guests at the parties. Payette sequin has an irrefutable charm and throughout detail of sequins. Shimmery Big Sequins are brilliantly stitched to ensure no piece of the cloth is left out.
